ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can butter beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: In a large saucepan, cook sausage, onion and garlic until the sausage is browned; drain.
Add beans, tomatoes, broth and basil.
Sprinkle each serving with Parmesan cheese.
title: Sausage Bean Soup
steps: In a large saucepan, cook sausage, onion and garlic until the sausage is browned; drain. Add beans, tomatoes, broth and basil. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with Parmesan cheese.
